publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1216.2 Mr Alasdair Morrison: Scottish Tourism-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1216) in the name of Mr David Davidson, leave out from "recognises" to end and insert "acknowledges that tourism has had a difficult year, but recognises and supports the Executive's on-going implementation of the New Strategy for Scottish Tourism, published in February this year." Supported by: Nicol Stephen*
